comments.author: steve5946
comments.body: Sorry everyone. My rate is $1500 per month or $30 per hour. Negotiable.

comments.author: Bttzed03
comments.body: Good luck with your service. It would probably help if you could get someone improve the design of your ANN. You might as well include your work portfolio (if you have any).

Nevertheless, as long as they like the service I provide, it's all good.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Your title says "Professional", but you're breaking forum rules 7 times by leaving 8 bumps in a row. Also, that font doesn't look professional at all.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: A whole lot of community of Virtual Assistants on LinkedIn. I understand LinkedIn is more professional and can give you a more professional coverage and clientele as well as connect you to community of people with like services, if you manage to build a healthy relationship over time, you'll surely get good gigs from there too
